name: # Add your hullmods here. One left commented out for reference.
# Accelerated Shields
desc: Increases the turn rate of the ship's shields by %s and the rate at which the shields are raised by %s.
short: Increases shield turn rate and extension speed.
sModDesc: Increases the shield's turn rate and raise rate by an additional %s.

name: Storm Dampner
desc: As long as this ship's CR is above 40 the fleet takes no damage when struck during a hyperspace storm and this ship loses CR as if it had been deployed in combat.
